14
15/*! \file */
16
17#include <config.h>
18
19#include <isc/mutexblock.h>
20#include <isc/util.h>
21
22void
23isc_mutexblock_init(isc_mutex_t *block, unsigned int count) {
24 unsigned int i;
25
26 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
27 isc_mutex_init(&block[i]);
28 }
29}
30
31void
32isc_mutexblock_destroy(isc_mutex_t *block, unsigned int count) {
33 unsigned int i;
34
35 for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
36 isc_mutex_destroy(&block[i]);
37 }
38}
39
